name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension Canva for Chrome | Design, Art & AI Editor

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Canva is your editor in one graphic design Extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension  Canva for Chrome is your editor graphic design app! 


























































Key Features:
Instant Access to Extension Canva: Create or edit designs directly from your browser.
Drag-and-Drop Editor: 

Seamless Integration: Design without leaving your browser, whether you're creating something from scratch or editing existing projects.




























this is not an official Canva extension
